item.title: Day 18

ðŸ“… June 18, 2025 â€“ Wednesday

  • 1-to-1 Mentorship Session with Senior: Had an insightful discussion with a senior regarding academics and internship planning. Their inputs helped refine my direction and priorities.
  • Finalised Room Allocation for Next Year: Locked in the room allotment for the upcoming academic year at Cauvery Hostel â€” Room 2057. A small but satisfying milestone.

A day of clarity and closure on logistical matters. The right guidance always comes at the right time.

item.title: Day 17
item.description:
ðŸ“… June 17, 2025 â€“ Tuesday

  • Tried Fixing a Stop Point in the Startup Work via Proxy: Attempted to resolve a critical issue in the startup project by experimenting with proxy setups. Unfortunately, it didnâ€™t work, but the effort contributed to my understanding of network routing and limitations.
  • Div 3 Codeforces Contest: Participated in a Division 3 CP contest. Gave it my best and picked up several key fundaes.
  • Took CP Fundae from Senior: Had a discussion with a senior who shared invaluable tips and strategies to improve in competitive programming. Grateful for the mentorship.

Another day filled with learning through failure, contest participation, and mentorship.
